Test Name: Myeloproliferative Neoplasm, JAK2 V617F with Reflex to CALR and MPL
Purpose: To detect the JAK2 V617F mutation and, if negative, reflexively test for CALR and MPL mutations to aid in diagnosis and treatment planning of suspected myeloproliferative neoplasms.
Equipment: PCR/thermal cycler, nucleic acid extraction kit, centrifuge, vortex mixer
